name: Asylum Escape (AngelaMC)
description:
This game prototype was done as part of a group project for our Experimental Games module.

It can be played fully with your voice.

It uses Windows Speech Recognition so make sure you have an active microphone. 

If you are a non-native English speaker I recommend ticking "Recognise non-native accents for this language" in your Microphone set-up settings.
